hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Transition Warning via SOL Perp Funding Turn
hypothesis_content.statement: In NEUTRAL regimes, when SOL perpetual funding rates turn negative after ≥5 days of positive funding, while SOL price breaks below its 50-day EMA on increasing volume, a transition to BEAR regime occurs within 3-8 days with SOL underperforming BTC by >10% over next 15 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: SOL is a key risk-on altcoin. Negative funding after extended positivity indicates leveraged long unwinding. Combined with technical breakdown, this often leads broader alt weakness and bear regime onset, as seen June 2024.
entry_conditions: SOL perpetual funding rate flips from positive to negative

exit_conditions.stop_loss: SOL funding returns positive + SOL price > 50-day EMA

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: SOL funding reverts positive within 2 days and price holds 50-day EMA, negating bear transition.
